overview: Three characters - two men and a woman follow a separate path in the world of uncontrolled nature, abandoned sites and buildings. All are immersed in a somnambulistic trance. One of the men is dreaming of an ideal world, the other is fascinated by death and decay. The woman is searching for love and her unity with nature. The meeting of all three of them leads to inevitable tragedy.
title: Fa(e)ces
